website_summaries.verdict: You'll love the look of this media storage cabinet with its tempered-glass door panes.
pros: Looks great anywhere in your home
Black color of the cabinet matches perfectly with the tempered safety-glass door panes
Will hold more than 100 DVD cases
Shelving is adjustable, meaning it will work with all different types of media
cons: Installation is tricky, as the pre-drilled holes don't always line up

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of the black media cabinets (See picture). These are great for the price. Time will tell how long they will stand up to day to day wear and tear but I am happy with the final product. Putting them together was a pain in the butt, but, I'm not going to mark that against the manufacturer. The most difficult part was ensuring the doors were aligned. On one cabinet the doors are slightly off and no matter how many times I tried to adjust them I just couldn't get them to match but it's not very noticeable. If you aren't looking to spend a whole lot of money on media cabinets I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these shelves for my DVD collection and was pleasantly surprised by the quality of this DIY build. I have built a lot of furniture lately and these shelves are one of the sturdier builds I've purchased. There were some inconsistencies though. I bought two shelves first and they were both very quality items. I was so impressed I bought two more and they each had issues. Pros: quality materials and shipping. Shelves are beautiful. Solid build. Cons: issues with 2/4 shelves quality. Doors are a little tough to level. Veneer scratches easily.
customer_reviews.author: Ned Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive with great pricing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Took awhile to put together and came missing a minor part but we easily improvised. Worth the effort. This is sturdy, very attractive and stores everything you might have. Be aware that the profile is narrow. The shelf is just a few millimeters short of 5” deep. We bought to display glassware and ended up sunny it in the bathroom in place of the medicine cabinet. I use little plastic bins from Amazon and spray painted them all black for a stylish and uniform look. Very pleased with the versatility and price. Look for “used” to save even more. The box was heavily damaged, but the components were packaged so well there was zero damage to the unit.
customer_reviews.author: leslie landberg

customer_reviews.title: Not worth what I was charged
customer_reviews.text: The glass was broken and honestly I paid 80 dollars for this it wasn’t worth 80 it’s a small shelf I thought I was getting a big bookshelf not what was delivered and delivered with broken glass almost cut my fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels wobbly
customer_reviews.text: I am using it as a medicine cabinet. It is perfect for that however somewhat limited by shelves. I realize it was not intended for this but I wish I had more shelves included because we ended up adding one more. The most annoying factor is the wobbling of the unit. We attached it to the wall and it still feels like it will topple over. I wonder if it would happen were I to put DVDs in it.
customer_reviews.author: epolna

customer_reviews.title: It's fine....just fine
customer_reviews.text: overall not bad, although my biggest reason for liking it is how perfectly it matches in the room. It is not very stable and the doors are a bit uneven (one closes tighter than the other). Some of the diagrams in the instructions were backwards so we just used our common sense and flipped them around, just be aware. I do love the color and I am using it as a modern type curio cabinet which it works well for. Happy with it for the price we paid and how it fits in my room.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Lohman

customer_reviews.title: Too short and not worth the assembly
customer_reviews.text: This was a HUGE disappointment. I bought this for the glass doors because our puppy kept pulling dvds off of our current dvd case and eating them.😩 First of all this was the most frustrating piece of furniture I have ever put together, and we own a lot of furniture from ikea. As you can see from the picture I havent even finished it because im so fed up with it after an hour and a half. I also didn't realize how short it is. The height is very dysfunctional and just looks bad. I would return it if I hadnt just wasted all this time trying to assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: WAY TO MANY PIECES TO ASSEMBLE so it takes serious patience to build
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding??? There are over 17 bags of screws, nuts, ties!! WAY too complicated and time consuming. This is literally a 2 hour project to put together. This should have been partially assembled. NO way are all those reviews legit. If I add all the pieces in the 17 small bags needing to be assembled, it will total over 150++ parts.
customer_reviews.author: M. T

customer_reviews.title: I built it myself!
customer_reviews.text: I’m impressed. Honestly, I was not expecting this cabinet to be this nice, but I needed an inexpensive solution to my DVD overload (these are what I kept after donating 200+). It took a while to put it together, most of which was figuring out how to balance the doors so the hinges would screw on straight, but I did it. The doors close smoothly and completely. The driftwood finish goes perfectly with my new “beach themed” home. I couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Paul

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have a bit of trouble visualizing how big something is without seeing it in person. The cabinet was a bit smaller than I'd anticipated, but it was easy to assemble and holds a decent amount of Bluray movies. They have a sleek modern look that compliments my living room nicely. While I've only had the two I ordered a short while, they appear to be sturdy. They also are easy to shift on my hardwood floors if I need to clean behind them.
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: Great for Movies
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these shelving units because our kitty kept chewing the cases on our open shelves. Let me just say these were perfect for what we needed. They are smaller in height than our last units, but hold more which I love! My husband is an avid collector and we bought 4 of these shelves to house his movies. They are sturdy and anchored well into the wall. The look is sleek and modern. Would definitely recommend and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Josie Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother- it’s garbage
customer_reviews.text: Absolute piece of garbage. When a furniture product is sent WITH GLUE that’s a clue that you’re buying junk. It’s flimsy and when screwing the hinges on for the door we had to glue them on because the particle board (let’s keep it real it’s not wood) splintered and split.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for our camper bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: We needed more storage in our camper bathroom but the space is already pretty tight so had to find something small enough to fit, and taller to maximize the space. This little cabinet fits perfectly! I think we will add another shelf or 2 to provide even more storage capacity. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Gusmom

customer_reviews.title: Cute cabinet but...
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the cabinet. I purchased two for my DVD collection. My husband but the cabinets together and the doors won't close completely. For one of the cabinets, the doors almost close but do not close completely. The other cabinet doors will not close at all. You can push them closed and can hear that the magnets catch but the doors pop back open once you let the doors go.
customer_reviews.author: H. Orgeron

customer_reviews.title: Such a good cute thing
customer_reviews.text: It works wonders for me. I put my video games in it. PS4 get's 1 shelf, Switch get's another and my drill and bits/screws get the third and the forth is currently unoccupied as I do not own a PS5 yet. It smells great, the color is great and it fits perfectly in any room.
customer_reviews.author: Crai Crushna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Spirits!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband's expanding whiskey collection. It fits the bottles and glasses perfectly. It arrived 2 days quicker than expected, went together pretty easily, and looks great. The only negative is that the assembly instructions were missing! However a call to the Walker Edison Company' Rachel and the manual was emailed instantly. That was excellent customer service. He's happy to have his bottles secured, I'm happy to have my cabinet space back! Gave it 4 stars for sturdiness, we will be securing it to the wall for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Marge Potts

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but a pain to put together!
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest to put together - but it’s very sturdy if you take your time . Took me about an hour and change assembling by myself . Also- not sure why there had to be 4 horrible sticky “tempered glass” stickers on the glass panels had a bunch of adhesive that then needed to be scraped off .
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: It took me a while to set it up
customer_reviews.text: One door was not cut out right where the hinge goes, so I made new holes, no problem but the screws were too short so I dug out some longer ones, 4 stars for the aggravation. I hate pressed board so cheap but it doesn't look cheap once it's up so I'm good with that. My herbs filled it in..
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Not very pleased customer.
customer_reviews.text: I should've read the measurements but it is way smaller than expected and really expensive for how small it is. Not just that 95% of the books we have do not fit so had to order a larger one that was the same price. Also it wasn't hard to assemble but half the holes don't match. And the magnet to keep it closed isn't even strong enough to keep it closed. Very disappointed.😞
customer_reviews.author: Cristin rowe

customer_reviews.title: Looks surprisingly great!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat the price on this! I bought the driftwood color and it really looks great. We are using it as a component cabinet for our router and Xbox, so I drilled wire holes in it. It’s particle board of course so you should be careful during assembly, but it’s surprisingly stable when all put together. The instructions were detailed and easy to follow. Loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S.

customer_reviews.title: Media tower
customer_reviews.text: It's smaller than I expected (and I read reviews saying it was small so I was surprised I was surprised lol). But it's actually really cute, and feels fairly solid. The only part I hate is furniture that has particle board that needs to be nailed on to the back. Like this one. But nevertheless, the glass is really nice and it has quite a heavy feel to it. I would know, I dragged it inside during a blizzard. We don't really buy DVDs anymore, but the ones we do still have look great in it. So if you are looking for an affordable, space conscious solution, this is actually pretty good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Madlove

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put Together.  Nice Storage Unit
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted a nice Cabinet for my DVDs and Blu Ray Collection. This is a very attractive unit. I bought the Black Color. It looks nice. Did not use the Anchor as I have no Kids in the House and the Weight of all the DVDs makes it sturdy and stable enough. Put together with a Hammer and Philips Screw Driver.
customer_reviews.author: AristedeGrimm

customer_reviews.title: Missing a knob
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble. It was missing a screw, but my husband found one he had to use instead. It was also missing a knob!! If we placed the cabinet in a more prominent place, I would've raised more of a stink.
customer_reviews.author: The Lady K.

customer_reviews.title: Way too small.
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what was expected..picture is very misleading but also my fault for not fully reading the description, but the reviews. It does NOT fit an Xbox one and is about 3 ft tall. We have it set up without the backing and the Xbox is leveled on a shelf with some hanging off both sides. Its a cute storage, but definitely not meant for this type of "media".
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Like it very much, nervous about it being pressed wood, but with dark color & the glass doors it looks a lot expensive. Moderately hard to put together. Take their advice & use the strap that attaches the cabinet to the wall...you can’t see it. Without the strap, It will be a little wobbly even on a tile floor.
customer_reviews.author: Girlboss22

customer_reviews.title: Nice DVD organizer storage
customer_reviews.text: Love that it matches our tv stand perfectly. Holds more than expected and fairly sturdy. The only thing was when assembling, the instructions state to put the magnet on backwards. The magnet ended up not being strong enough to hold the doors shut so we flipped it to the stronger side which worked out. Overall good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Christina H

customer_reviews.title: Slim, perfect for a small spot
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for what I needed it for. Needed something to hold spices in my small kitchen. It's slim and was perfect for my little spot. Very easy to assemble and was surprisingly sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: A bookshelf for ants?!
customer_reviews.text: What is this? A bookshelf for ants?! How can we be expected to put books in it if they can’t even fit inside? I don’t wanna hear your excuses! The bookshelf has to be at least... three times bigger than this!
customer_reviews.author: Earl Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: The cutest little miniature cabinet EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I love this media shelf! I customized my cabinet a little, using wallpaper. I get so many compliments and now my Mother & Mother and Law want one for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Mac

customer_reviews.title: A good small cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: Once assembled it seems sturdy. It is small but I ordered it specifically because I needed something with a specific depth to fit in a hallway. It fits that purpose. The grey finish is nice.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Nice DVD Tower
customer_reviews.text: One of the nicer "assemble yourself" pieces of furniture I have ever bought. Very sturdy and the glass is high quality. Not sure why the company decided to use cheap, plastic handles on an otherwise nice DVD tower but not a big enough downfall to knock off a star on the review. Handles can easily be replaced with another set from a hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: JDS II

customer_reviews.title: Bought Two of These to go with a South Shore Corner TV center
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect. Good height. Wood is embossed black wood-grain. Stores all our DVD's that originally took up and entire 5 shelf bookcase and with the glass fronts, I will not have to clean the cases as often. I purchased them without consulting the husband. He was very happy with the construction and shipping pack. Went together easily. Maker provides extras like wood glue and stickers to cover the cams once they have been tightened down. Sturdy base and does come with a wall mount to attach them securely to the wall. My husband had them both together in a little under an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Trav & Mischa Millsap

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cabinet. Instructions not the greatest, but they work. Put together in under an hour with cordless screwdriver. I fastened the back with screws and a small piece of 3m tape instead of supplied nails. Overall very happy. It matches my decor and it's small size fits my condo.
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Drill holes are too big. Probably, a damaged piece.
customer_reviews.text: I regret over buying this shelf. Received a piece where the drill holes at the hinges are too big and the screws provide are small to use in those holes. I have been tired of trying to fix this. Hope I get a refund. Unhappy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: SO

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Shelf
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed at the quality of this product for the price that I paid for it. The shelf came very well packaged and was marginally easy to put together. The instructions were clear and came with extra pieces, just in case you lost something. The shelf itself is very sturdy and pleasing to look at. The size was as expected and it holds four rows of DVDs very nicely. I do not own very many DVDs, so this worked out very well for me and my family. I am pleased with the smoothness of the doors and how well the magnetic handles work. I would recommend this product for someone who is looking for a small, aesthetic dvd/cd shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: It was okay!
customer_reviews.text: This was so much smaller than I thought it would be? But that’s probably my fault for not measuring. The only thing this bookcase can really hold are manga sized books. And not very many at that. otherwise, it’s beautiful. I decided to use it to store tinctures and other stuff for my herb shop.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Item works out great for us
customer_reviews.text: Item works out great for us. We don't have kids. But if you do think twice very cheap material. Plus you must hold it to open the doors. The anchor for the wall that came with it sucks. For us it works great and it does look very nice...
customer_reviews.author: angelina

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for 5 months. So far it's holding up great. I did upgrade the handles with black metal and used rice paper from lowes for a slight tent on the door glass. So far we are extremely happy with it and if we ever need more space another will be purchased.
customer_reviews.author: E Amroth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little cabinet! Ty ;-)
customer_reviews.text: At first it looked intimidating but you know it really isn’t all that complicated to put it together if you can read the instructions properly. Every hole matched up and all the parts I needed to put this together were in there. Beautiful little cabinet!
customer_reviews.author: Sexyloca81

customer_reviews.title: Way better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I love the look and it's much more solidly built than I was expecting. The instructions were clear and I was easy enough to put together myself. I've gotten so many compliments already! I'll be getting another one and I'd definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Great for compact spaces
customer_reviews.text: Addition to my office space. Size and color goes well. Very easy to assemble. Fairly sturdy. Not too wide so large books will not fit with the spine looking out. So I have them sideways. Shelving is adjustable. Overall very satisfied with product.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Melendez

customer_reviews.title: Walker Edison 41" media cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is small but it holds alot of DVDs which is what I wanted for my grandsons DVDs and some Goosebumps books. It looks very nice and doesn't look cheap. My husband put it together without any problems but he is better at that than I am. The room I put the cabinet in has carpet and it did make it unsteady so my husband rigged it to the wall with a strap so it wouldn't tip forward.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Stylish DVD Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This was really easy to put together and it looks great with all of my other furniture made of black wood. I didn't care for the plastic handles so I went to the hardware store and bought some pretty metal ones that were the same size and shape. That made this cabinet perfect. Mine currently contains 69 DVDs, 59 CDs, 8 Xbox games, and 6 Nintendo DS games and there is still more room! (this isn't too scientific because some things are in those slim cases and some are in regular cases) As my media collection grows I will probably buy another one of these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tiny / Cratched Glass
customer_reviews.text: It's an accent piece. It will not hold much. This is more to hold DVDs than books. I knew this going in, and that was ok. Unfortunately, one of my doors had a large scratch in the glass. It's not a mark, it's definitely a scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but uneven doors.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cabinet, but the doors are uneven due to the predrilled alignment holes and it’s noticeable. Had I not already assembled it, I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Tamica W.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I ended up having to order two of these, they were very small and don't look right in the space. Since it was too much trouble to send them back I will probably give them away and find something else. Quality was just ok. One of them came with assembly parts missing so had to order those and wait for it to come in.
customer_reviews.author: K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice. Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Sturdy. Fairly simple to put together. They give you some kind of strap piece that is meant to be used as a wall anchor which was good for taking the finish off the particle board but that's about it. My advice is to ignore that part. Wish it was just a little taller but for the price it's not a bad looking piece of fake furniture.
customer_reviews.author: somebody out there

customer_reviews.title: Nice bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, I had all the parts and some extras just in case. Took about a half an hour to assemble. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Sorry pics are sideways not sure why they did that. Nice cabinet. Instructions were easy and took me an hour and a half.
customer_reviews.author: melswheeler

customer_reviews.title: Received broken !
customer_reviews.text: We actually ordered 2, So the cabinet is fairly nice but really narrow (a baby story couldn’t fit , more suitable for DVD’s) + the way it was packaged is totally wrong which made it break on the way apparently ! I think we’re gonna change our mind and send both of them back
customer_reviews.author: Koko

customer_reviews.title: I love the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a couple of shelves for the unit and emailed customer service. They responded promptly and shipped them out. I will probably order another one if I ever need more DVD space.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great media cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Great media cabinet! I was hoping the inside space on the shelves would be wider however so I could use it for things besides DVDs. For an 8" exterior depth I thought I read somewhere that the interior depth was 6-7", but it's really only 5-5.5". So my teapot doesn't fit but at least the tea cups do.
customer_reviews.author: hillary

customer_reviews.title: Shipping Trouble
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i wanted, but it took 3 tries for it to get to me. The 1st delivery was damaged during shipment, the second delivery was lost and the third try finally made it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Harris

customer_reviews.title: Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered this product because I was moving and was shopping for new furniture. I happen to see this online. I like how its not too big and it's a space saver. My apartment not too big so it was the right size. The only I was dissappointed about was that the description had said that this holds over 100 dvd movies but it didn't. So I had to order another one so I can fit all my movies. 2 is good enough for me. But overall I liked the product it looks really nice and goes with all my furniture and it doesn't take up that much space at all.
customer_reviews.author: FENI786

customer_reviews.title: Quite pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something narrow to sit a photo on and wanted to store cds... tadaaa! I was impressed with the amount of real wood in it! Looks great! Holds all my cds! Highly recommend this low cost option!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Zima

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Product not fulfil the customer satisfaction Very small in size doors are not closed properly As shown in the picture not in real cabinet I won't recommend any one to buy dis
customer_reviews.author: selvaraja

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I'd like but looks good
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot smaller than I was hoping, although I ordered it without paying close attention to the dimensions so I can't really be upset about that! It does look nice though and does the job it's supposed to. Only holds about 100 DVDs. It was a pain to assemble but cheap furniture usually is so again, can't hold it against the product.
customer_reviews.author: ATop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: I was incredibly disappointed in the size, it is so much smaller than expected! It actually reminds me of a book case you would put in a toddler’s room as it is that size! I would not buy again. Way too expensive for what you get. I’ll be going to IKEA next time!
customer_reviews.author: Loren J.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute and functional little cabinet. It looks nice in my living room. Putting it together was somewhat difficult for me. There are parts of of it I'm not happy with because of it. I took off 1star for the difficulty of assembly. Otherwise, it's as expected.
customer_reviews.author: wyldchyld

customer_reviews.title: Looks terrific!
customer_reviews.text: This is a small unit and perfect for storing dvds and music cds. Was easy to put together and can be moved easily also. It looks great in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: happy camper

customer_reviews.title: Tiny contraption - a “bookshelf” fit for a Lilliputian
customer_reviews.text: The product description lists it as a bookshelf. It requires a closer look to see that it is also described as a media storage cabinet. It is reeking of being deceptive. And if it is a bookshelf, it’s made for a Lilliputian. Not a happy customer
customer_reviews.author: anmush

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth $100...  :(
customer_reviews.text: I just got this put together. It's not as advertised. The reviews I read are not exactly accurate. Its not well made and it is cheap looking and feeling. When I called customer service, I spoke with Alex who told me he was a nice guy today and was willing to give me a $5 credit. Needless to say, I terminated the call. Pathetic Amazon.. you should have done more! I'll be asking for a return label..
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Fee

customer_reviews.title: DVD/cd storage
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and for the size holds a lot.
customer_reviews.author: GeriK

customer_reviews.title: good purchase
customer_reviews.text: although the measurements are listed its a little smaller than i expected. Overall, a good purchase due to its sturdy base and swift assembly. TIP....when the instructions require you to gently hammer in the back panel, you really only need about 6 nails to make the back panel hold in place not the 16 thats sent with the unit....you will be hammering forever because they are so small.
customer_reviews.author: MARCQUIS A. JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Great small shelf
customer_reviews.text: Price changes on this. Holds around 100 DVDs as it says, not a ton, but construction is good and easy to put together. Must be fasten to wall if on carpet as it easily tips. Includes a wall strap that is very easy to connect. Note - I bought 1 and went to buy another. Pricing increased 50% in a couple days. Would not pay over $80 for this IMHO. I paid $65. It is currently listed at $90. Not buying another at $90.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S. Fansler

customer_reviews.title: would buy again
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect to hold all of my CD's it is very sturdy and love the color
customer_reviews.author: Gabby goose

customer_reviews.title: This cabinet is actually pretty nice. It’s well packaged and protected
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is actually pretty nice. It’s well packaged and protected. The doors have real glass. The assembly was easy. I love that when I assembled it the doors actually hung evenly. I think that was a first for self assemble furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Price should’ve been way cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Should’ve been ALOT cheaper than what I bought it for!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ent7114

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and great quality! VERY easy to put together, did the two of them in about 45 minutes. Heavy duty and very pretty. Love, love, love them!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good looking cabinet with the exception of little damage on two small areas. Did not return because both are on the parts not facing the front and not significant enough.
customer_reviews.author: GoncaD

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace a smaller shelf. This one has a nice look to it however it still isn't big enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: biggdawg

customer_reviews.title: Classy looking
customer_reviews.text: Love these little cabinets, as we have 4 & my mother has one. They really work well storing our blue-rays, DVD’s & games & quite a bit more than they look. Easy to put together & a nice accent piece. They get many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Kat F

customer_reviews.title: Much better quality than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Much better quality than I expected! It feel solid and not flimsy at all. I used it for a display case for some heavy items and it is perfect! It is very easy to put together. Comes with a instruction book. I would definitely purchase this item again!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Travers

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Came timely, good instruction for assembly, and they added a small glue tube for the dowel rods. I’ve assembled man6 things with those little wooden dowels, never thought to add glue!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca McAnallen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and value
customer_reviews.text: First it was smaller than I expected. But really for me that worked out well, as the room I put it in is smaller in the first place. Other than that its great. Went together well, and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Robb

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love the stand and I use it for my DVD’s. My only complaint is with the assembly. The small nails used to tack on the back covering are ridiculously small are hard to tack in as a result. Once your past that part of the install. It’s Wonderful
customer_reviews.author: HizQueen

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love the furniture. It looks pretty. Speedy and fast service. Will use you again. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Mea

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, goes well in my living room. Assembly wasn't too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Seaton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My 16 month old is into everything now, so I had to get rid of my free standing DVD towers. I came across this cabinet and WOW, is it awesome! It was easy to assemble and looks great. It fit all of my DVD's from my 2 free standing towers, plus room for more. It should hold about 100 DVD's if you sit them upright, more if you stack them up and down. All I needed was a childproof lock for the handles and no more DVD's thrown all over the floor anymore! Best purchase I made this month. Couldn't be happier with it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Tina Bertram

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good DVD tower. Its easy enough to assemble with just one person. It is a decent size and looks nice. My only complaint is that the handles on the doors are plastic and look cheap. I wouldn't let that be a deterrent to those of you who are contemplating purchasing this item, considering you can always replace the handles at a local hardware store (I plan on doing this myself). Overall, I am pleased with this product and am glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: BlueLM

customer_reviews.title: I love the style of this but it's very small
customer_reviews.text: I love the style of this but it's very small. Also the door on my doesn't shut properly. But it's probably something I didn't do right in putting it together. But this is a cute little tower. It is very small but it wold hold a lot of cd's and a good amount of dvd's. I use mine for my Star Trek dolls and some books and a baseball.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: it turned out wonderful! So I gave it five stars
customer_reviews.text: Assembling it was straightforward didn't break to much of a sweat! I thought strongly on hiring somebody to assemble it for me. Laughs! Overall, it turned out wonderful! So I gave it five stars. You have to own what works for you and your household and this does it. I would say the only draw back for me about the product, it's not as spacious as I hoped it to be. I'm going to make it work nonetheless! Because where I have my entertainment area, it gave me more space to use for other things. Take care & God bless!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Easy and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, easy to assemble. DVDs fit perfectly in there. Sturdy enough on hard floors. Plan to buy another one. Very pleased 😁
customer_reviews.author: Missdarla69

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something inexpensive to house my DVDs and this was perfect. It took me about an hour to put it together. It's very light, even when filled but I wasn't expecting heavy for the price. I did,'t realize how many DVDs I had so I only have room for a couple of more but that's my fault. I gave it four stars because five would mean it was beyond my expectation.
customer_reviews.author: pareli

customer_reviews.title: Nice DVD Tower
customer_reviews.text: The DVD Tower wasn't too hard to assemble though some of the diagrams in the manual can be a bit deceptive if you're not paying close attention to details. It was in fact smaller than I thought but that's a good thing because it doesn't take up too much space and still stores all my games and DVD's. It's worth more around $70 IMO not the $84 I paid, but hey, I've gotten some great deals from Amazon in the past so I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: WalletHead

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and I thought it was bigger in size, but turned out to be the perfect size for her. It was easy to assemble and is sturdy! Great wedding present!
customer_reviews.author: kim c.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love it. My husband built it in the time I took to nap with the baby. We use it to hold his games with our controllers on top in our room. Perfect size for just that. And it was shipped on time.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Smaller Than I Thought
customer_reviews.text: This holds almost all of our DVD's and video games well, looks great but it way smaller than what was pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Rhoads

customer_reviews.title: Solid piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: I do like this DVD/blu ray/game tower, however, it is a bit short. I shouldn't have been as surprised, as the 41" are clearly displayed (i.e. on the product description), but I have to bend over every time I open the cabinet. A tall piece of furniture it is not, but it's WELL MADE AND EASY TO ASSEMBLE. I am happy overall with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Moore

customer_reviews.title: As advertized
customer_reviews.text: This is a super stylish tower. Just make sure to check the stats. It stands up to about an average waist height. It was easy to put together and is made of quality materials. I recommend buying a set. They look super stylin on opposite sides of a room. But there are lots of ways to really dress up a room with a pair of them. Matches well with other black furniture.
customer_reviews.author: minafox22

customer_reviews.title: A Sturdy and Beautiful DVD Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This DVD case or cabinet is just what I needed. It arrived with everything needed to install it in very good condition. The DVD case is very beautiful and looks great in my den. I secured it to my wall to insure its stability, and I would recommend that anyone purchasing it insure that it is secure to a wall. It is much too beautiful to let it topple and possibly become damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Milt

customer_reviews.title: money well spent
customer_reviews.text: love it... was really worried it would be like alot of the other furniture you by outta a box with the pressed wood covered with a wood grain sticker ikea stuff that you cant move with because it falls apart.. this is sturdy, clean and easy to put together.... i just wish i came in a bigger size! i may have to buy 2 because of the amount of blurays, dvds; and video games i own
customer_reviews.author: Jose Torres

customer_reviews.title: Not Wobbly
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cabinet and easy to put together! It took me about half an hour to put together and doesn’t wobble like the older ones did ! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Air Dale

customer_reviews.title: Great cabinet.  Looks classy.
customer_reviews.text: I love this cabinet. I purchased it to store essential oils. It’s perfect. Now I just need to figure out how to put lighting in it.
customer_reviews.author: TINA PUCKETT

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit. Well made. Easy to assemble. We use it to store Video DVDs. Very happy with the quality of this product. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It’s very cute but small anyways it goes very well on my living room
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Calouro

customer_reviews.title: Great for book storage
customer_reviews.text: I currently hold 72 One piece mangas in this case and they look great and fir amazing! A lot of room for more than 72 books!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great storage
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these and they are perfect! Store several dvds and we use the tops as a little display mantle! Beautiful and we always get compliments on them!
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 units, they were very easy to assemble. Not as dark as I'd hope and I wish they were taller. Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna

customer_reviews.title: Great looking unit.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking unit when assembled. Very easy to put together, less than 2 hours. Holds about 125 DVDs. Very lightweight. Price was great, too. Hard to find small thin units. Stores don't have much to choose from. You will not be disappointed in this item. We also bought a Walker Edison home entertainment unit which matches nicely.
customer_reviews.author: W. Bessette

product_meta.title: Walker Edison Furniture Company 4 Tier Shelf Living Room Storage Tall Bookshelf Cabinet Doors Home Office Tower Media Organizer, 41 Inch, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackPerfect for your bedroom, living room, game room, or home office, this multi-functional media tower provides ample storage to house your favorite DVDs, CDs, games, books, media and more. Features two adjustable shelves crafted from high-grade MDF with durable laminate finish behind two double doors with tempered safety glass panes. This transitional style storage cabinet will become an essential piece to your home, as it will help keep whichever room you place it in tidy.
feature_bullets: Dimensions: 41" H x 18" L x 8" W
Made of high grade MDF, metal, and durable laminate
Can hold up to about 100 DVDs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars744 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
